payloads: SQLi::SELECT id FROM users WHERE id>2

airlock.name: Airlock
airlock.regex: The server detected a syntax error in your request

aliyundun.name: AliYunDun
aliyundun.regex: Sorry, your request has been blocked as it may cause potential threats to the server's security|//errors\.aliyun\.com/

armor.name: Armor Protection
armor.regex: This request has been blocked by website protection from Armor

asm.name: Application Security Manager
asm.regex: The requested URL was rejected\. Please consult with your administrator|security\.f5aas\.com

barracuda.name: Barracuda
barracuda.regex: \bbarracuda_|barra_counter_session=|when this page occurred and the event ID found at the bottom of the page|<!--(0123456789){15}

bitninja.name: BitNinja
bitninja.regex: alt="BitNinja|Security check by BitNinja|your IP will be removed from BitNinja|<title>Visitor anti-robot validation</title>

bulletproof.name: BulletProof Security Pro
bulletproof.regex: (?s)bpsMessage.+?403 Forbidden Error Page.+?If you arrived here due to a search or clicking on a link

cerber.name: WP Cerber Security
cerber.regex: We're sorry, you are not allowed to proceed|Your request looks suspicious or similar to automated requests from spam posting software

cloudbric.name: Cloudbric
cloudbric.regex: Your request was blocked by Cloudbric

crawlprotect.name: CrawlProtect
crawlprotect.regex: <title>CrawlProtect|This site is protected by CrawlProtectc|Set-Cookie: crawlprotecttag

dotdefender.name: dotDefender
dotdefender.regex: dotDefender Blocked Your Request|Applicure is the leading provider of web application security|Please contact the site administrator, and provide the following Reference ID

godaddy.name: GoDaddy Website Security
godaddy.regex: GoDaddy Security - Access Denied|Access Denied - GoDaddy Website Firewall

greywizard.name: Greywizard
greywizard.regex: (?i)server: greywizard|detected attempted attack or non standard traffic from your IP address|<title>Grey Wizard</title>

gtmc.name: GTMC WAF
gtmc.regex: GTMC WAF1 Protection:|Please consult with administrator or waf@nm.gtmc.com.tw

imunify360.name: Imunify360
imunify360.regex: Server: imunify360-webshield|protected by Imunify360|Powered by Imunify360|imunify360 preloader

isaserver.name: ISA Server
isaserver.regex: The (ISA Server|server) denied the specified Uniform Resource Locator \(URL\)

malcare.name: MalCare
malcare.regex: Blocked because of Malicious Activities|Firewall(<[^>]+>)*powered by(<[^>]+>)*MalCare

modsecurity.name: ModSecurity
modsecurity.regex: (?i)Server:.+mod_security|This error was generated by Mod_Security|/modsecurity\-errorpage/|One or more things in your request were suspicious|rules of the mod_security module|mod_security rules triggered|Protected by Mod Security|HTTP Error 40\d\.0 - ModSecurity Action|40\d ModSecurity Action|ModSecurity IIS \(\d+bits\)

netscaler.name: NetScaler AppFirewall
netscaler.regex: <title>Application Firewall Block Page</title>|Violation Category: APPFW_|AppFW Session ID|Access has been blocked - if you feel this is in error, please contact the site administrators quoting the following

ninjafirewall.name: NinjaFirewall
ninjafirewall.regex: <title>NinjaFirewall: 403 Forbidden|For security reasons?, it was blocked and logged

onmessageshield.name: onMessage Shield
onmessageshield.regex: This site is protected by an enhanced security system to ensure a safe browsing experience|onMessage SHIELD

paloalto.name: Palo Alto
paloalto.regex: has been blocked in accordance with company policy|Palo Alto Next Generation Security Platform

radware.name: AppWall
radware.regex: Unauthorized Request Blocked|You are seeing this page because we have detected unauthorized activity|mailto:CloudWebSec@radware\.com

reblaze.name: Reblaze
reblaze.regex: For further information, do not hesitate to contact us

requestvalidationmode.name: ASP.NET RequestValidationMode
requestvalidationmode.regex: HttpRequestValidationException|Request Validation has detected a potentially dangerous client input value|ASP\.NET has detected data in the request that is potentially dangerous

shieldsecurity.name: Shield Security
shieldsecurity.regex: Something in the URL, Form or Cookie data wasn't appropriate

securesphere.name: SecureSphere
securesphere.regex:
Error

.+?#FEEE7A.+?Error|Contact support for additional information.
The incident ID is: (\d{19}|N/A)

siteground.name: SiteGround
siteground.regex: The page you are trying to access is restricted due to a security rule|Our system thinks you might be a robot!|/.well-known/captcha/

siteguard.name: SiteGuard
siteguard.regex: Powered by SiteGuard|The server refuse to browse the page

sitelock.name: TrueShield
sitelock.regex: SiteLock Incident ID|SiteLock will remember you and will not show this page again|<span class=\"value INCIDENT_ID\">

stackpath.name: StackPath
stackpath.regex: You performed an action that triggered the service and blocked your request

sucuri.name: Sucuri
sucuri.regex: Access Denied - Sucuri Website Firewall|Sucuri WebSite Firewall - CloudProxy - Access Denied|Questions\?.+cloudproxy@sucuri\.net

watchguard.name: WatchGuard
watchguard.regex: Server: WatchGuard|Request denied by WatchGuard Firewall

webknight.name: WebKnight
webknight.regex: WebKnight Application Firewall Alert|AQTRONIX WebKnight|HTTP Error 999\.0 - AW Special Error

webland.name: WebLand
webland.regex: Server: Apache Protected by Webland WAF

webseal.name: WebSEAL
webseal.regex: (?i)Server: WebSEAL|This is a WebSEAL error message template file|The Access Manager WebSEAL server received an invalid HTTP request

webtotem.name: WebTotem
webtotem.regex: The current request was blocked by.+?>WebTotem<

wordfence.name: Wordfence
wordfence.regex: Generated by Wordfence|This response was generated by Wordfence|broke one of the Wordfence (advanced )?blocking rules|: wfWAF|/plugins/wordfence
